attributes.additional_details: I am requesting a petition to start the Dress Aware Campaign. Like drink aware. We should be highlighting the issues that arise when people to not dress responsabily.  This is to stop people walking the streets with spare tyres on show, white tummies showing or just general loutish dress. This would also impact on safety. WE should have a symble for Dress aware and this should be placed on new clothes labels and also on mirrors.

rejection.details: Drink Aware is an independent charity, supported by voluntary donations from the drinks industry.  This would be for the fashion industry to initiate.
